content: अग्राह्य {%<ab>a.</ab>%} Not acceptable, that which ought not to be taken or accepted as a gift, present &c.; °ह्यं शिवनिर्माल्यं पत्रं पुष्पं फलं जलं; not to be perceived, admitted or trusted; not to be considered or taken into account. --ह्या <ab>N.</ab> of the clay or मृत्तिका which ought not to be taken for purposes of purification.
